review: After having used the Amazon Fire TV Stick for several months now, I can tell you it is one of the easiest and best ways to watch all of your favorite shows any time and almost anywhere! We have cut back on our cable channels (and bill) because there is so much available when you have a Fire stick. We watch Netflix a lot, as well as streaming Amazon videos, music, TV - just about anything you want to see is out there. We LOVE this little device and highly recommend it if you like EASY to use and lots of choices.

review: In general it works well for the purpose.  However, there are two things worth considering before you buy it:1. and the more serious one: The wifi connection is buggy.  I have use it just a week, and I have met a couple of wifi connection problems.  The thing is after wake up the fire stick saw my wireless router, and connected to it but complaining connection problem, while all my other devices worked well with the same router.  The only solution is to unplug the power of the stick and plugin again, because there is no reboot setting for the stick, this can be quite inconvenient sometimes.2. The power adapter for the stick is unusually big and take up the space for two outlets.Un the upside, it is fast and the remote is quite handy.  With the purchase of Plex app, it works nicely for me.
